summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 7 and 8, Evans & Blewett's Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue West and 4th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West McGraw Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 104219 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
